name: Magnetic Haste
description:
Try to solve our new levels in this sequel of the puzzle game Magnetic Maze!

Original game by Artem Gulyaev and Juan C. Osorio

Sequel by Luisa Enciso, Martin Bremer and Nina Hanau.

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences Berlin.

 

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
